channel.title: Rithesh Kumar Ravikumar
channel.description: #Music. DSP. Electronics. A musician creating technology for music. Electronics nerd. Will wash dishes for DSP. Can run a 5k for C++.

item.title: Vocopter
item.description: VoCopter is a voice controlled video game, written using the JUCE framework. It converts a raw MIDI file into obstacles. Player has to maneuver the copter through the obstacles by singing the right pitch.

item.title: Moog Hackathon
item.description: Second runner up in Moog Hackathon held at Georgia Tech Centre for Music Technology. A 3D printed object with touch sensors and Inertial Measurement Unit controls a synthesizer based on Gesture Recognition. The synthesizer output runs through a glass plate reverb for acoustic effect.

item.title: Euclidean Beatgen
item.description: An app to make Euclidean Rhythms based on Bjorklund's Algorithm. Written on Max/MSP using Javascript. Click here for video demo.

item.title: Electrical Engineer
item.description: Was an Electrical Engineer at Kickr Design LLC. Helped prototype engineering products for clients, and took care of electronics/electrical aspests.

item.title: Audio Software Intern
item.description: Wrote testcases for their core DSP algorithms in C++. Was a part of their Kickstarter campaign.
